segments.text: Excuse me . I'm looking for Bluemingdails . Could you tell me how to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It's very close actually.You go straight down this road . Then you turn left , at the next junction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bluemingdails is on the corner of that block . You see it as you turn left.Seriously , You can't miss it.It ' s enormous .
segments.speaker: S2
